events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item was completely different from what I had selected. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request due to customer dissatisfaction and desire to return the incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to Agent Sarah for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your order and receive a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with this.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item is unopened and in its original packaging for the return process?
The order number is 789654123. The package is unopened and the item is still sealed inside the box.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated the return request for your order. You will receive an email with a return shipping label shortly, and a full refund will be processed once we receive the item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and look forward to completing the refund smoothly.
The return process has been set up successfully. Please use the shipping label emailed to you to send back the product. We will update you once the refund is completed.
Just following up to ensure you have received the return label and can proceed with the return. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund successfully. Your case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
